buy out.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to buy someone’s share of a business or property that you previously owned together, so that you have complete control
buy out.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to pay money so that someone can leave an organization such as the army before their contract has ended
buy out.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to buy all of someone’s shares in a business that you previously owned together, giving you complete control
buy out.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: They plan to buy out the shares of all the other shareholders.
buy out.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: staff who had tried to buy out the company to keep it working
